snippet: Novak Djokovic defeated Juan Martín del Potro on Sunday to capture a second Shanghai Masters title and extend his winning streak in China to 20 consecutive matches.
abstract: Novak Djokovik defeats Juan Matin del Potro to capture his second Shanghai Masters title; other tennis news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and REUTERS

lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic defeated Juan Martín del Potro on Sunday to capture a second Shanghai Masters title and extend his winning streak in China to 20 consecutive matches.

headline.main: Djokovic Defeats del Potro to Take Title in Shanghai
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Defeats del Potro To Take Title in Shanghai
